item.description:
Hallo Alle Zusammen!

Hoffe, es geht allen gut! Lange haben wir uns nicht mehr getroffen - es wird mal wieder Zeit!

Let's meet for some after work drinks at RI RA's Irish Pub in downtown Providence!

Hope all the old and new members can come!

If you guys have some ideas for meetup-meetings for the future, bring your ideas to RI RA's and we can discuss our summer and fall plans.

See you soon!

Macht's alle gut und bis bald,

- Hanna
item.how_to_find_us: I will be waving a German flag!
item.name: After Work Drinks and Chats
